  <head>
   <title>
    WRCC
   </title>
   <meta charset="utf-8"/>
   <meta content="Regional Climate Centers (RCC) deliver climate services at national, regional and state levels working with NOAA partners in the National Climatic Data Center, National Weather Service, the American Association of State Climatologists, the Regional Sciences and Assessment Program, and other NOAA Research Institutes." name="description"/>
   <meta content="climate,service,data,western,weather,forecasts,research,archive,repository,measurements, science,noaa,wrcc" name="keywords"/>
   <meta content="website" property="og:type"/>
   <meta content="Western Regional Climate Center" property="og:title"/>
   <meta content="https://wrcc.dri.edu" property="og:url"/>
   <meta content="Western Regional Climate Center, providing climate services, data, and research for 13 western states" property="og:description"/>
   <link href="/Styles/wrcc.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css"/>
   <link href="/Graphics/Logos/favicon_wrcc.png" rel="shortcut icon"/>
   <script src="//ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/1.11.3/jquery.min.js" type="text/javascript">
   </script>
   <script src="//ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jqueryui/1.11.4/jquery-ui.min.js" type="text/javascript">
   </script>
   <script src="/Libs/form_utils.js" type="text/javascript">
   </script>
   <script type="text/javascript">
    function fnAJAX_Call(surl, oparms, fndone)
   {
     // generic wrapper for AJAX calls and subsequent error handling; accepts
     //   object with POST parms and callback fn; if no error, invokes
     //   specified callback function with oparms (which in addition to being
     //   POST parms may be used to pass vals to the callback fn) and
     //   json-decoded results (array or object, as appropriate)
 
 //<![CDATA[
 
     // define a retry counter to deal with a known problem with mangled
     //   POST parms in AJAX calls with IE >= 6; declare this as a local
     //   static var to persist through recursive calls of this same function
 
     if (typeof fnAJAX_Call.iretry == "undefined")
       fnAJAX_Call.iretry = 0;
 
     $.post(surl, oparms
     ).done(function(sresponse)
     {
       // if get a response (even if it's an error), reset retry counter
 
       fnAJAX_Call.iretry = 0;
 
       if (sresponse && sresponse.length)
         var aresponse = sresponse.split("\n");
       if (!sresponse)
         alert("Null response from server!");
       else if (!sresponse.length)
         alert("Empty response from server!");
       else if (aresponse.length != 3)
         alert("Error in format of response from server!" + " ==" + sresponse +
           "==");
       else if (aresponse[0] == "OK")
         fndone(oparms, JSON.parse(aresponse[1]));
       else
         alert("Error: " + aresponse[1]);
     }
     ).fail(function()
     {
       // the ideal would be actually wait a period of time, but JS timer
       //  calls don't just sit at one statement, and the jQuery delay()
       //  function doesn't work well outside a jQuery execution or
       //  animation chain; instead we'll just recurse a ridiculous number
       //  of times before deciding a server problem really does exist
 
       if (fnAJAX_Call.iretry++ < 30)
         fnAJAX_Call(surl, oparms, fndone);
       else
       {
         // reset retry counter for next time and report error
 
         fnAJAX_Call.iretry = 0;
         alert('No response from server!');
       }
     });
 
 //]]>
   }
 
 
 
   function fnDate_Str(itime, bshort, bday)
   {
     // create date string in one of several standard formats from supplied
     //   UNIX time, including local time zone corrections; remember JS wants
     //   UNIX time in msec
 
     var odate = new Date(itime * 1000);
 
     if (typeof bshort == "undefined")
       bshort = false;
     if (typeof bday == "undefined")
       bday = false;
 
     if (bday)
       var sdate = (bshort ? aDAYS_SHORT[odate.getDay()] :
         aDAYS_LONG[odate.getDay()]) + ", ";
     else
       var sdate = "";
 
     sdate += bshort ? aMONTHS_SHORT[odate.getMonth()] :
       aMONTHS_LONG[odate.getMonth()];
     sdate += " " + odate.getDate() + ", " + odate.getFullYear();
     return sdate;
   }
 
 
   function fnTime_Str(itime, bmilitary)
   {
     // create time string in one of two standard formats from supplied UNIX
     //   time, including local time zone corrections; remember JS wants UNIX
     //   time in msec
 
     var odate = new Date(itime * 1000);
 
     if ((typeof bmilitary != "undefined") && bmilitary)
     {
       return ("0" + odate.getHours()).slice(-2) +
         ("0" + odate.getMinutes()).slice(-2);
     }
 
     var ihours = (odate.getHours() <= 12) ? odate.getHours() :
       odate.getHours() - 12;
 
     // deal with midnight, which most people expect to see as 12:xx AM, not
     //   00:xx AM
 
     if (!ihours)
       ihours = 12;
 
     return ihours + ":" + ("0" + odate.getMinutes()).slice(-2) + " " +
       ((odate.getHours() < 12) ? "AM" : "PM");
   }
 
 
 
   function fnNew_Tab(surl)
   {
 
 
     var owin_new = window.open(surl, '_blank');
     owin_new.focus();
   }
 
 
   function fnContent_Height_Adj()
   {
 
 
       var imin_height = $(window).height() - $("#divHeader").outerHeight(true) -
         $("#divFooter").outerHeight(true) - $("#divMenuBar").outerHeight(true) -
         $("#divMenuBar").outerHeight(true) - 25 -
         parseInt($("#divContent").css("marginTop")) -
         parseInt($("#divContent").css("marginBottom"));
 
       if ($("#divHome_About").length)
         imin_height -= $("#divHome_About").outerHeight(true);
 
 
 //      if ($("#divContent").height() < imin_height)
         $("#divContent").css("minHeight", (imin_height - 20) + "px");
     }
 
 
     function fnJump_To(stag)
     {
 
 
       $("html, body").animate({scrollTop: ($("#" + stag).offset().top - 65) + 
        "px"});
     }
 
 
 
 
 
   $(window).load(function()
   {
     // get random banner graphic
 
     $("#divBanner").css("backgroundImage", "url(/Graphics/Banners/head_logo7_1100x166.jpg)");
 
     // dynamic display adjustments
 
     fnContent_Height_Adj();
 
   });
   </script>
  </head>

       <div class="box_split_wrapper">
        <div class="box_23 border_vert">
         <h2>
          Recent Climate in The West
         </h2>
         <p>
          Temperature departure from Average and Percent of Average 
            Precipitation for the past 30 days
         </p>
         <a href="https://wrcc.dri.edu/cgi-bin/anomimage.pl?wrc30dTvdep.gif">
          <img alt="climate map" src="https://wrcc.dri.edu/cgi-bin/anomimage.pl?wrc30dTvdep.gif" width="250"/>
         </a>
         <a href="https://wrcc.dri.edu/cgi-bin/anomimage.pl?wrc30dPpct.gif">
          <img alt="climate map" src="https://wrcc.dri.edu/cgi-bin/anomimage.pl?wrc30dPpct.gif" width="250"/>
         </a>
         <div style="text-align:right;padding-bottom:10px;padding-right:35px;">
          More
          <a href="https://wrcc.dri.edu/anom/">
           climate anomaly maps
          </a>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="box_13">
         <a href="http://www.dri.edu/newsroom/news-releases/5431-in-memorial-dr-kelly-redmond" target="_blank">
          In Memoriam - DR. KELLY REDMOND
         </a>

       <div class="box_wrcc">
        <p>
         <strong>
          Western Regional Climate Center
         </strong>
         <br/>
         2215 Raggio Parkway
         <br/>
         Reno, NV  89512-1095
         <br/>
         Tel: 775-674-7010
         <br/>
         Fax: 775-674-7001
         <br/>
         E-Mail:
         <a href="mailto:wrcc@dri.edu">
          wrcc@dri.edu
         </a>
         <br/>
         Open Monday - Friday
         <br/>
         8am - 4pm Pacific Time
         <br/>
         <a href="http://www.facebook.com/pages/Western-Regional-Climate-Center-WRCC/330763610291776" target="_blank">

         </a>
         <a href="http://www.facebook.com/pages/Western-Regional-Climate-Center-WRCC/330763610291776" target="_blank">
          WRCC 
          on Facebook
         </a>

        </div>
        The Western Regional Climate Center is a partner in a suite of 
        interconnected services that include:
        <br/>
        ♦
        <a href="https://www.ncei.noaa.gov/" target="_blank">
         National Centers 
        for Environmental Information (NCEI)
        </a>
        ♦
        <a href="/state-climate-offices/">
         State Climate Offices
        </a>
        <br/>
        ♦
        <a href="/About/rcc.php">
         Regional Climate Centers (RCCs)
        </a>
        ♦
        <a href="http://www.doi.gov/csc/index.cfm" target="_blank">
         USDI 
        Climate Science Centers (CSCs)
        </a>
        <br/>
        ♦
        <a href="http://www.climate.noaa.gov/cpo_pa/risa/" target="_blank">
         NOAA
        Regional Integrated Sciences and Assessments (RISA)
        </a>
